As the game that served as an important source of culture-defining memes and set the standard for 3D puzzle games, Portal is a must-have for everybody who likes the genre. As you learn how to think with portals, you also might get interested in the physics behind the phenomena.
The story mode can be finished in 1-3 hours but the additional challenges can keep you entertained for days.

Le jeu qui m'a fait découvrir Steam à l'époque de mon tout premier compte Steam, même en 2021 (14 ans après) le chef d'oeuvre reste le même. Comment j'ai pu me passer de lui aussi longtemps en le re-payant aussi tardivement ? Le "2" est également un chef d'oeuvre, mais celui là occupera toujours la place du meilleur dans mon coeur, ce n'est pas tellement de la nostalgie, mais j'ai vraiment une préférence pour celui là.

good

Portal is a puzzle game that isn't too hard and the puzzles are satisfying to solve. This is a game that makes you feel smart and the gameplay just feels fun. The narrator GLaDOS is hands down the best character in any game her lines are written in a way that makes you feel uncomfortable but in the same time they are funny. The entire aperture science facility is mysterious but we don't get to know that much about this place until the second game. The song at the end is neat and it is a great way to end this game. Only bad thing I can think of is that its only 1-3 hours long. I prefer the second game but this is still a solid 10/10 for me.
good puzzle game but the escape part is too long and boring in my opinion

Forms FORM-29827281-12:
Test Assessment Report

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here:
HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are
still alive.

Forms FORM-55551-5:
Personnel File Addendum:

Dear <<Subject Name Here>>,

I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are
still alive.

Forms FORM-55551-6:
Personnel File Addendum Addendum:

One last thing:

Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa...
THAT WAS A JOKE. HA HA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there,
it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.

PS: And believe me I am
still alive.
PPS: I'm doing Science and I'm
still alive.
PPPS: I feel FANTASTIC and I'm
still alive.

FINAL THOUGHT:
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.

FINAL THOUGHT PS:
And when you're dead I will be
still alive.

STILL ALIVE

先玩的传送门2再玩的1，两个半小时通关，全程没看攻略。
传送门1最大的缺点可能就是太短了。我通关时候的感觉就是：这就结束了？不知怎么地就找到了GLaDOS，然后打败她，游戏就结束了。相比于传送门2，1只能算个序章。从游戏的角度来说，1更像是2的基础，是2的前期探索。1的关卡设计也很出色，有些关卡也挺难的，但比起2最难的那几关还是有差距。传送门2在1的基础上进行了极大的拓展，玩法和1一脉相承，同时各种细节都比1要完善。说实话，玩完2再玩1是有点失望的，可是仔细一想，2也是站在1这位巨人的肩膀上才做得更好，因此也没有理由给1差评。
Eins der wenigen Spiele, die man immer wieder spielen kann. Einfach P2P (Pay to Play)... keine Bundles, Packs, DLCs oder sonstiges was einem keinen Spaß beschert.

포탈은 좋은 게임이다.
어디서도 볼 수 없었던 포탈이라는 참신한 소재와 이를 활용한 흥미로운 퍼즐들과 길찾기는 오랜만에 재미있는 퍼즐 게임을 즐기며 풀어낸다는 것을 경험하게 해주었다.
플레이 타임은 긴 편이 아니지만 그 시간 내내 퍼즐 게임으로서 계속 흥미로운 퍼즐을 던져줌과 동시에 흥미로운 스토리까지 보여주니 지루할 틈이 없었다.
개인적으로 게임내내 이어지는 ai, 글라도스의 말들이 매우 마음에 들었는데, 글라도스의 캐릭터 성을 살림과 동시에 이 게임만의 특색을 더욱 짖게하는 포탈에서 빼놓을 수 없는 중요한 요소중 하나라고 생각한다.

포탈은 짧지만 굵고 재미있는 게임이다.

"Portal is a test bed, Portal 2 is a game." More than just the trendsetter and a surprise hit for the Orange Box. Portal has a dismal and oppressive atmosphere lined in it's desolate walls, one of the few aspects it's sequel couldn't follow up on. Don't forget about it.
